extendedInfo.description: Datadroid is a mobile data capture solution that replaces paper forms with electronic forms. Our mobile app utilizes Android phones and tablets to deliver mobile forms to your workers via the Internet.Paper FormsYour mobile workers may include surveyors, auditors, inspectors, couriers; or another role that requires working off site with paper forms. Paper forms are wasteful, require printing, can get lost, require manual re-entry etc. Datadroid frees your workers from the disadvantages of paper and replaces them with the benefits of electronic Android forms. Electronic FormsElectronic forms do everything that paper forms do as well as capture photos, signatures, GPS coordinates, self validate etc. Your mobile workers no longer need to come back to base to deliver a completed report, they simply submit over the web to your secure portal ready for export to PDF, Word and Excel.Our ToolsWe provide you with a form builder, PDF/Excel report generator and an app for each of your mobile workers. The form builder is online and accessible from any modern web browser. You don't need to be a programmer to use it - all you need is to know what you want your form to look like.Datadroid requires no permanent Internet connection, no booting or fiddling with cables. Any activity that currently involves a paper-form being completed can now be done using Datadroid anywhere and at any time.

reviews.title: Great alternative
reviews.comment: I have a 7 page paper form I wanted to change over to electronic format for use on my tablet occasionally offline.  This was it! The only reason I didn\'t give 5 stars is due to the price as it seems very expensive per month,  and I wish the the forms had a couple more options such as \"select one\"  with a text box for a \"other\" category,  like Google forms.
reviews.author: Mike Johnson

reviews.title: Well
reviews.comment: Works good but only lets u upload 11 areas to track. Also it can only do 1 record at a time and cant bring other data into the form... e.g. if you do a door to door survey you have to enter all of the info every time. Where I would have liked to have some areas uploaded and able to have populated. The price jump per month of data is steep for my blood.
reviews.author: Erik Kaiser

reviews.title: Saving us time
reviews.comment: Our checklist inspections are conducted straight from the galaxy s3s, submitted back to base as well as emailed to our customer.... no more paper, great solution and helping us stay green
reviews.author: David Penn

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Full featured including offline mode.  Could improve by showing GPS accuracy
reviews.author: greg oldroyd

reviews.title: Ok, but over priced
reviews.comment: Free version is pretty useless. And the app needs some work. It is also very pc dependent. And should also be available on apple devices.  Monthly fee is over priced
reviews.author: Jason kable

reviews.title: seriously excellent
reviews.comment: its one of those apps that does what it sais it does while keeping it as simple to use as possible. i love how easy it is to create a form and then publish it to my team. what use to be a 24 hr data gathering task where my guys would go out carry out inspections on note pads is now done instantly.... they do the work submit the form and i get emailed a pdf report... great.  keep up the good work and thank you for the support
reviews.author: Harjinder Kalsi

reviews.title: Cant use existing docs
reviews.comment: Why cant we use an existing document on our pc? The whole thing doesnt make much sence to create a new form when its nit what you want. I tried draging a pdf, doc...etc
reviews.author: Shawn Muir

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great time saving and organisation tool, can\'t live without it now. 5 Stars!
reviews.author: BYG BYG

reviews.title: Utilisima
reviews.comment: Lo que buscaba...cumple con lo que necesitaba demasiado \303\272til!

reviews.comment: Bad demo

reviews.title: Bait and switch
reviews.comment: Ridiculous $100 Price for a year. Developer does not disclose correct information in the FREE version. Not allowed to use camera, email, or more than 10 questions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent support
reviews.comment: Error was my own, support was world class, system works, would recommend.

reviews.title: Fantastic App!
reviews.comment: Unbelievable! Too good! Freaking  awesome! Thank you will be a small word  but it has truely make my work very easy.  Datas and informations should be accurate  and this app gives you that.

reviews.title: I can\'t use it
reviews.comment: hey,you are supposed to make it easy to use NOT difficult..I dunna where to ask.ur FAQ, sucks!!

reviews.title: Mind blowing

reviews.title: Nice!

reviews.title: Great!

reviews.title: Fantastic!

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Fantastic in the field, especially for technicians. Erases the \"oops, we forgot to get signatures\" problems and lost paper is a thing of the past. I work in medicine, so the level of accuracy is deeply appreciated. Making forms from our existing is extra easy.
reviews.author: A Google User
